reviews.name: Fil Lorinc
reviews.comment: Great downtown corridor home to Campisi's, Woolworth, Starship Bagel, and the famous Dallas Eyeball sculpture and accompanying lawn.PlaygroundNoneRestroomsNo public restroomsDog-friendlinessDoggos welcome :)Picnic areaNo picnic area, per se, however there are tables and chairs typically put out by Starship Bagel

reviews.name: Lauren B
reviews.comment: One of the most dangerous areas at night.

reviews.name: Rebecca Werner
reviews.comment: Right next to the Giant Eyeball, Stone Street Gardens is a collection of restaurants in an older building.

reviews.name: Teqmok
reviews.comment: It's just a walkway connecting Elm St and Main St.

reviews.name: Soud Zaidan
reviews.comment: Food was disgusting and bartender was rude.
